AddServersToServerGroup.title: AddServersToServerGroup
AddServersToServerGroup.summary: Adds backend servers to a specified server group.

AssociateAdditionalCertificatesWithListe.title: AssociateAdditionalCertificatesWithListener
AssociateAdditionalCertificatesWithListe.summary: Associates additional certificates with a listener that uses SSL over TCP.

AttachCommonBandwidthPackageToLoadBalanc.title: AttachCommonBandwidthPackageToLoadBalancer
AttachCommonBandwidthPackageToLoadBalanc.summary: Associates an EIP bandwidth plan with a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

CancelShiftLoadBalancerZones.title: CancelShiftLoadBalancerZones
CancelShiftLoadBalancerZones.summary: Adds the elastic IP address (EIP) and virtual IP address (VIP) of a zone to the DNS record.

CreateListener.title: CreateListener
CreateListener.summary: Creates a TCP or UDP listener, or a listener that uses SSL over TCP for a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

CreateLoadBalancer.title: CreateLoadBalancer
CreateLoadBalancer.summary: Creates a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance in a specified region.

CreateSecurityPolicy.title: CreateSecurityPolicy
CreateSecurityPolicy.summary: Creates a custom security policy for a listener that uses SSL over TCP in a specified region.

CreateServerGroup.title: CreateServerGroup
CreateServerGroup.summary: Creates a server group in a region.

DeleteListener.title: DeleteListener
DeleteListener.summary: Deletes a Network Load Balancer (NLB) listener.

DeleteLoadBalancer.title: DeleteLoadBalancer
DeleteLoadBalancer.summary: Deletes a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

DeleteSecurityPolicy.title: DeleteSecurityPolicy
DeleteSecurityPolicy.summary: Deletes a custom TLS security policy from a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

DeleteServerGroup.title: DeleteServerGroup
DeleteServerGroup.summary: Deletes a server group from a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions supported by Network Load Balancer (NLB).

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: Queries zones in a region that supports Network Load Balancer (NLB).

DetachCommonBandwidthPackageFromLoadBala.title: DetachCommonBandwidthPackageFromLoadBalancer
DetachCommonBandwidthPackageFromLoadBala.summary: Disassociates an Internet Shared Bandwidth instance from a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

DisableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.title: DisableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet
DisableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.summary: Change the public IPv6 address of a dual-stack Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance to a private IPv6 address.

DisassociateAdditionalCertificatesWithLi.title: DisassociateAdditionalCertificatesWithListener
DisassociateAdditionalCertificatesWithLi.summary: Disassociates additional certificates from a listener that uses SSL over TCP.

EnableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.title: EnableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet
EnableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.summary: Changes the private IPv6 address of a dual-stack Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance to a public IPv6 address.

GetJobStatus.title: GetJobStatus
GetJobStatus.summary: Queries the result of an asynchronous task on a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

GetListenerAttribute.title: GetListenerAttribute
GetListenerAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a Network Load Balancer (NLB) listener.

GetListenerHealthStatus.title: GetListenerHealthStatus
GetListenerHealthStatus.summary: Queries the health check status of a listener that is added to a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

GetLoadBalancerAttribute.title: GetLoadBalancerAttribute
GetLoadBalancerAttribute.summary: Queries the details about a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

ListListenerCertificates.title: ListListenerCertificates
ListListenerCertificates.summary: Queries the server certificates of a listener that uses SSL over TCP.

ListListeners.title: ListListeners
ListListeners.summary: Queries listeners added to a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

ListLoadBalancers.title: ListLoadBalancers
ListLoadBalancers.summary: Queries Network Load Balancer (NLB) instances in a region based on specified conditions.

ListSecurityPolicy.title: ListSecurityPolicy
ListSecurityPolicy.summary: Queries the TLS security policies set for a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

ListServerGroupServers.title: ListServerGroupServers
ListServerGroupServers.summary: Queries the backend servers in a server group.

ListServerGroups.title: ListServerGroups
ListServerGroups.summary: Queries the server groups of a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags of a resource.

LoadBalancerJoinSecurityGroup.title: LoadBalancerJoinSecurityGroup
LoadBalancerJoinSecurityGroup.summary: Associates a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance with a security group.

LoadBalancerLeaveSecurityGroup.title: LoadBalancerLeaveSecurityGroup
LoadBalancerLeaveSecurityGroup.summary: Disassociates a security group from a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a resource to another resource group.

RemoveServersFromServerGroup.title: RemoveServersFromServerGroup
RemoveServersFromServerGroup.summary: Removes backend servers from a server group of a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

StartListener.title: StartListener
StartListener.summary: Enables a Network Load Balancer (NLB) listener.

StartShiftLoadBalancerZones.title: StartShiftLoadBalancerZones
StartShiftLoadBalancerZones.summary: Removes an elastic IP address (EIP) or a virtual IP address (VIP) of a zone from a DNS record.

StopListener.title: StopListener
StopListener.summary: Disables a listener for a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to resources.

UpdateListenerAttribute.title: UpdateListenerAttribute
UpdateListenerAttribute.summary: Updates the attributes of a listener, such as the name and the idle connection timeout period.

UpdateLoadBalancerAddressTypeConfig.title: UpdateLoadBalancerAddressTypeConfig
UpdateLoadBalancerAddressTypeConfig.summary: Changes the network type of the IPv4 address of a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.title: UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute
UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.summary: Updates the attributes, including the name, of a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

UpdateLoadBalancerProtection.title: UpdateLoadBalancerProtection
UpdateLoadBalancerProtection.summary: Enables or disables the deletion protection feature.

UpdateLoadBalancerZones.title: UpdateLoadBalancerZones
UpdateLoadBalancerZones.summary: Modifies the zones and zone attributes of a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

UpdateSecurityPolicyAttribute.title: UpdateSecurityPolicyAttribute
UpdateSecurityPolicyAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of a security policy for a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance.

UpdateServerGroupAttribute.title: UpdateServerGroupAttribute
UpdateServerGroupAttribute.summary: Updates the configuration of a Network Load Balancer (NLB) server group.

UpdateServerGroupServersAttribute.title: UpdateServerGroupServersAttribute
UpdateServerGroupServersAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of backend servers in a server group, such as the weight and description.
